app.name: Bright AI Platform
app.tagline: Automation and executive analytics for Saudi enterprises

home.heroTitle: Turn operational data into executive decisions in minutes
home.heroSubtitle: Bright AI unifies integrations, workflow design, and executive analytics for Saudi leadership teams.
home.heroStatThree: Data governance aligned with Saudi market requirements
home.journeyStepOne: 1) Choose a template or create a new agent for your team.
home.journeyStepTwo: 2) Design the workflow and connect data sources and API keys.
home.journeyStepThree: 3) Test, publish, and monitor performance from dashboards and analytics.
home.quickNavSubtitle: Jump directly to core system sections from the homepage.
home.quickDashboardDesc: Track performance, executions, and operational alerts in one place.
home.quickBuilderDesc: Create a new agent with guided steps and advanced settings.
home.quickTemplatesDesc: Browse ready templates and build agents faster.
home.quickMarketplaceDesc: Explore marketplace solutions and scalable ready-made flows.
home.quickAnalyticsDesc: Analyze cost, tokens, and success rates across time ranges.
home.quickSettingsDesc: Manage account, API keys, notifications, and security.
home.metricOneNote: From request to production in your current stack.
home.metricThreeNote: Clear governance and documented data lineage.
home.problemBody: Operations teams lose time consolidating data and aligning decisions across fragmented systems.
home.solutionBody: A unified platform that builds visual workflows, runs AI analysis, and distributes results instantly.
home.proofBody: Executive dashboards with traceability and measurable impact on decision speed.
home.useCaseOne: Automated daily reporting for contact centers tied to commercial KPIs.
home.useCaseTwo: Supply chain analysis connected to government data lakes.
home.useCaseThree: Operational compliance monitoring for semi-government entities.
home.ctaTitle: Launch Bright AI inside your organization
home.ctaBody: A 30-minute discovery session to define the first measurable workflow.
home.toastStart: Your demo request has been received

workflow.title: Visual workflow builder
workflow.subtitle: Drag stages, connect AI analysis, and track the impact on executive decisions.

footer.rights: All rights reserved for Bright AI

errors.notFoundBody: The requested route is not available.
